item.title: How the Strongest Leaders Practice Gratitude and Resilience in Adversity
item.description: Gratitude and resilience aren’t soft skills, but concrete leadership advantages, especially in hard times.

item.title: Why Showing Your Scars Makes You a Better Leader
item.description: You will lead the best from the places you once feared the most.

item.title: This Company 3D-Prints With Fat to Heal Chronic Wounds
item.description: Founded in 2009, Tides has evolved from a distributor of birth-tissue products into a biotechnology platform focused on regenerative medicine.

item.title: You Can Now Read Jeffrey Epstein’s Emails in a Searchable Interface
item.description: The interface makes it easier to search through a monumental trove of documents. The site includes verification links to government originals.

item.title: A Millennial-Favorite Lunch Trend Is Falling Out of Favor
